name: LovenseSkillsForRemoteApp
0:
”Alexa, ask lovense to make me smile with lush”
”Alexa, tell lovense let's play with Hush on low”
”Alexa, ask lovense to please my partner with Nora on high”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lovense
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Lovense Remote App now supports voice control. Control your Lovense toy or your partner’s toy using this great feature! Once you have installed the Lovense skills for the Remote App you will be able to:
- Have hands-free control of your toy(s)
- Select low, medium or high vibration settings
- Choose from a selection of default vibration settings 
- Control multiple toys at the same time 
- Long distance control of your partners toy(s) 

How to connect
Set-up
- Make sure you have the Lovense Remote App (available at the Google Play store or Apple App Store) installed on the device you want to use.
- Download this skill onto your Amazon Alexa product.
- Connect your Lovense toy(s) to your device using the Lovense Remote app
- To enable Alexa in the app go to “Settings”, select “Linked Accounts” and then choose “Alexa” and follow the instructions.

Please note: 
If for any reason you are unable to get the voice command(s) to work during use please revert back to the Lovense App for control. For this reason, we recommend that you keep your mobile device within reach at all times.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
